insert into t_score (score_plus, score_subtract, score, unit_id, reason, create_time, modify_time) values (#{scorePlus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scoreSubtract,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_score set score_plus = #{scorePlus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score_subtract = #{scoreSubtract,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, score_plus, score_subtract, score, unit_id, reason, create_time, modify_time from t_score
